verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come, you blessed of my Father,
Receive the Kingdom as your own;
For what you did in the hidden place
You did before my throne.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come, you blessed of my Father,
Receive the Kingdom as your own;
For what you did to the least one
You did unto the King.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I was hungry and you gave me meat.
I was thirsty and you gave me drink.
I was a stranger and you took me in.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I was naked and you clothed me.
I was sick and you visited me.
I was in prison and you came to me.
